name: Easy Social Signal Counter
author: Jayasri Nagrale

sections.description:
Easy Social Signal Counter is a light-weight plugin that measures the social activity on each of your blog posts and shows it to you in a easily understandable, tabular format.
If you are serious about taking your blog to the next level and increasing engagement on your blog – you need a tool to measure your social media efforts and know which posts to focus on.
This is a plugin that helps you measure and track the social engagement on your posts.

This plugin doesn’t require any external javascript files – what that means for you is that this plugin will not make your site slow down or clog your webpages with heavy files.
Easy Social Signal Counter will run only when you open it and show you all your social stats – in one neat table.

If you have suggestions for a new add-on, feel free to email me at jine.feather@gmail.com
Want regular updates? Please signup here – http://eepurl.com/bahjyr – Thanks!

Now mesaure, track and plan to increase the social activity on your blog – this plugin will show you the results.
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-social-signal-counter directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Easy Social Signal Counter to the social engagement on your posts.

short_description: Easy Social Signal Counter is a light-weight plugin that measures & displays the social activity on each of your blog posts in a tabular format.

screenshots.caption: screenshot-1.jpg depicts the 'Easy Social Signal Counter' plugin in action. From the settings menu, you can find a sub-menu named Easy Social Signal Counter. Once selected, this page is shown wherein you can see the social activity on each of your blog posts.
